channel.title: D3 on Kyle Rassweiler's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in D3 on Kyle Rassweiler's Portfolio

item.title: Node SCADA System
item.description: As the name implies it is a SCADA system written in js(Node.js), the system uses the mcprotocol to communicate with a Mitsubishi PLC, uses Jade for templates, and express for routing.
